Class NetServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.bases.ClosableElement
      • ch.nolix.system.client.Server
        • ch.nolix.system.client.NetServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clearable<Server>, Closable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class NetServer
extends Server
    A net server is a server that listens to net clients on a specific port.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
